name: The Hã€“N Series #5
description: There has always been someone to interpret by early display hardware projects for an audience. Getting the light to vibrate in such a way that it stirs something within an audience. These images are my search for that moment of emotional resonance. The hardware has been abstracted by optics salvaged from a different type of display. A reminder that a lot of my hardware development has depended on hybridization. The goal is to capture the ephemeral nature of light and how light brings objects
